instructions: Move the dinner plate to the center of the table.
Place the dinner fork on the table to the left of the dinner plate with the handle facing down.
Place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork and facing the same direction as the dinner fork
Place the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate with the handle toward the edge of the table
Place the salad knife next to the dinner knife facing the same direction as the dinner knife.
Place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with the handle facing the table's edge.
Place the water glass above the dinner knife and close to the dinner plate.
Place the wine glass to the right of the water glass about an inch apart.
Place the wine glass to the right of the other wine glass.
Place the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon and under the wine glass.
Place the bread plate directly above the dinner fork.
Place a butter knife on top of the bread plate with the handle toward the dinner plate.
Place the dessert fork above the dinner plate with the handle facing the bread plate.
Place the dessert spoon above the dessert fork and facing the opposite direction of the dessert fork
Place the napkin vertically on top of the dinner plate and centered.
